item.title: Giving the person who tells me the glow code gets admin on my awsome server
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:1, topic:134350”]First, add this boolean if it isn’t already there:

public boolean adminglow = false;

Next, look for public boolean process() and add this under it:

if (adminglow = true) { stillgfx(246, absY, absX); // this is just the graphic I use. You can choose your own. }

And finally, add this command:

if (command.startsWith("adminglow") && playerRights >= 2) { adminglow = true; }

as for ownerglow and modglow, just use the same thing, but change things such as the stillgfx
and the playerrights.

Oh, and you don’t have to make me an admin unless you want to.[/quote]

I added this and its admin glow for me even when I don’t want it on =S

Read full topic
item.source: Giving the person who tells me the glow code gets admin on my awsome server
